page.title: 18THE WEIR,WARBOYS
page.content: The{weir}is the only pond in Warboys that you can legally fish in for free. It has all kinds of fish in it.I'll name a few:rud,roach,perch,and different kinds of carp and tench,minnows,stickleback,eel,and bream.A mirror carp is the heaviest fish in the{weir. On one side of the {weir}there is a hardware store called Stewards.It is situated at a fork in the road where Mill Green meets the High street. It is down the road from the Library.In the {weir}there are mostly fish but there are two patches of lily pads and a lot of weeds. lt also has a few ducks on it.It was used for Baptisms until the 1930's when a new baptistry was built in the Baptist Chapel. There are lots of insects like pond skaters and flies and lots of amphibians like toads, frogs and newts.
